titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/7/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Provides for a joint session of Congress on February 12, 2013, to receive a message from the President.
